name: Aivya
description: A Telegram AI Chatbot powered by OpenAI, written in Python with Pyrogram.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get a bot token from @BotFather on Telegram

MONGO_URL.description: Get a MongoDB connection URL from https://cloud.mongodb.com

LOGGER_ID.description: Your log channel/group ID. Add your bot there and promote as admin. Use @userinfobot to get the ID.

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram user ID. Use @userinfobot to get your ID.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Get your OpenAI API key from https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
